html:
10.18.19  4:16 pm   Do you plan on ever making a 3rd instalment in the history of series?

     that sounds like a good idea

10.18.19  3:43 pm   help i am lost where is up can you tell me  
  where is up?

     drop something, then go the other way

10.18.19  3:35 pm   will you ever go on a tour?

     yes

10.18.19  3:32 pm   Will you ever do a sequel to bears? i love that one!

     it turns out, 'die' was a sequel to 'bears', but i accidentally made the second one first. to be clear, i should explain that the lyrical content has nothing to do with each other. they were literally part of an exercise to make songs of increasing length, starting with 1 second, then 2, etc. The problem is, i screwed up and 'die' was actually 2 seconds, thanks to the cymbal. so i had to backtrack and do a shorter one. but if you are looking for more pieces in the 5 seconds or less range, i am pleased to announce that i did way more of those than i ever should have

10.18.19  2:46 pm   would you like some lemonade?

     yes but how do i know you're not bluffing

10.18.19  2:27 pm   9.5.19  5:27 pm what kind of school tho?

     maybe doing some audio/visual media, possibly answering some questions to supplement it

10.18.19  2:05 pm   do you live in a field

     no but i may have came from there

10.18.19  1:30 pm   10.17.19  5:43 pm   the question is "where's the video LOL!!!!!" would now be a good time to ask or should I try a different time?

     any time is fine, but what video specifically

10.18.19  1:27 pm   Do you write lyrics first then music, or music then lyrics?

     no

      Or do you write music with your left hand and lyrics with your right hand simultaneously?

     usually i think of them both simultaneously in my mind, and then sing the lyrics musically while accompanying it musically on the keyboard. then i talk through and discuss how it went, how it's going, or how it possibly should go instead. then do it again

10.18.19  1:26 pm   Will you ever make a video for "Got to Know What's Going On"?

     yes

10.18.19  1:24 pm   Have you ever considered releasing your music on physical media like vinyl?

     no but i would consider it if the internet got sick and died, which i don't expect to happen but you never know

10.18.19  1:21 pm   What have you been doing these past 7 months?

     re-inventing my entire brains out, while also trying to hide from people who keep reminding me how long it's actually taking

10.18.19  12:45 pm   I know how to win at spelling, but how do you win at grammar?

     impossible. in grammar, everybody loses

10.18.19  12:31 pm   Can we get a timeline for when your next project will be complete?

     sure. wait, what the heck is a project

10.18.19  10:27 am   i have creative block could you please give me a lyric to start with 

     of

10.18.19  9:59 am   Do you like books,or maybe something that books for a birthday party at booktopia, or maybe a book about booking for a birthday party at booktopia for 5 books an hour?

     books are very cool, but i must admit what i love to do most with them is display them on video

10.18.19  9:44 am   if you could change your name, what would you change it to?

     Magic Johnson

10.18.19  8:49 am   any advices on how to deal with autumn?

     start on a big project you are afraid will take too long, and then be amazed when spring comes frighteningly soon

10.18.19  8:34 am   do you have any ideas for me

     probably

10.18.19  5:09 am   when will we get bill wurtz 2?

     exorbitantly soon

10.18.19  4:58 am   Hey bill, what's a potato?
.
.
.
.
.
.

     it's like a baseball, of nature

10.18.19  4:19 am   how are you going to go about making a major scientific breakthrough in particle/quantum physics? Aren't there entire teams of scientists across the whole world trying to do the same thing with huge machines worth millions? Of course, there's no harm in trying, and you're probably smart enough. Just wondering how you're planning on doing it.

     i guess it just comes down to asking the right questions

10.18.19  4:07 am   Is it now time for the news, travel and weather where you are?

     i think you can get that stuff online, any time

10.18.19  3:12 am   How did you learn to start bringing people closer and letting them in?

     i didn't, but i did learn how to retreat away from people

      Was self-improvement involved?

     yes

10.18.19  3:08 am   can you help me get over my social anxiety?

     i think so

10.18.19  2:56 am   10.16.19  7:18 pm How would you describe this ability? Is it like more analytical "I can literally hear all the notes", or emotional "feels like pants" or just plain experience?

     experience has taught me how to identify all the feels. which is way quicker than identifying the notes individually. but experience has also taught me how to identify the notes, on the off chance that they might be feelless chords, i can always do it the hard way, with notes

10.18.19  2:47 am   I'm hoping you can be real with us here.  Were you ever an average singer?  

     still am

      Did you need to do exercises to become great?

     the peculiar thing i found very quickly was that improvising the lyrics is really the only way to unlock the voice. besides that, over time it gets better anyway

        Hope you see the importance of honesty in a question like this.

10.18.19  1:11 am   coolest map you've ever drawn?

     maybe this one

10.18.19  12:24 am   yo dude what time is it

     Friday, October 18, 2019 11:57:09 PM

10.17.19  11:46 pm   what am i supposed to do with my life after school bill please help

     start a business

10.17.19  10:40 pm   why is my soup soupy

     it must be fate, or destiny, i always forget which is which

10.17.19  10:27 pm   What Do You Think About South-American Followers??(Spanish-Speaking Fans)

     they're pretty good

10.17.19  10:24 pm   Will you ever type at least one capital letter?

     sounds like you've never seen my videos but if you don't want to watch them, i have collected all the capital letters used on just the questions page alone, here

10.17.19  10:03 pm   Do you have a schedule when it comes to answering these?

     it's generally once a day (or 2 ..... oops)

10.17.19  9:01 pm   how often do you update scarmble?

     was once a day for most of last year, but currently not at all because i am working on developing a whole myriad of new things

10.17.19  8:17 pm   thoughts on the CN Tower?

     useful, in case i forget which way is up

10.17.19  8:15 pm   how do you come up with such deep answers?

     fracking

10.17.19  7:53 pm   what did you major in at college?

     i don't even know how to major in something at college. i don't even know how to go to college actually. not even sure what college is. i hope it's not important......

10.17.19  7:18 pm   Do you think this shirt looks good on me

     for some reason i can't seem to see it

10.17.19  7:13 pm   hey so i was listening to this rap song and i'm having trouble trying to discern the rhythm that he raps at a certain part https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mwnMeAfB7xk at about 2:21. the farthest i've gotten is i'm thinking they might be quadruplets? but in 4/4? some kind of 4:3 polyrhythm? in addition, i'm wondering how one would go about transcribing this rhythm so if you could help show me that, it would be much appreciated. thanks

     that would be exactly 4:3. the word "pistol" starts exactly on beat 4, and there have been exactly 16 notes covering the span of 12 normal subdivisions. if i had to write that for myself to read, i might do something like this. truly the sound is pretty exact dotted 16th notes, which are probably not pleasant for anyone to read. but the way i wrote it at least gives an idea of the neighborhood of where the beats land, while also making a written note to clarify. or maybe i would write a note to myself "actually dotted 16ths" because i am aware of how dotted 16ths are supposed to land, mathematically. (4:3 like you said). actually, update, at this tempo it would actually be dotted 32nd notes. same concept but even more beams. even more of a reading nightmare

10.17.19  7:08 pm   hpw did u get ur singin voice

     by singing. that's the only way.

10.17.19  6:57 pm   how do i find direction?

     look for arrows, etc

10.17.19  6:36 pm   what do you think of cats?

     they have a certain electrical quality to them

10.17.19  6:08 pm   How many days of sleep do you get each day?

     anywhere up to 1 half a day

10.17.19  6:08 pm   What is your advice on making friends?

     start a business? or join a business. either one should work. business is friendly

10.17.19  5:46 pm   if you could beat up anybody (and have a 100% chance opf winning) who would it be

     bullys

10.17.19  5:43 pm   bill i have a question, is now a good time to ask?

     that depends what question it is

10.17.19  4:25 pm   If you were to wake up in a field somewhere and you didn't know which direction was which and the sun was low in the sky... would you be able to tell if it was sunrise or sunset? (You don't have any time telling device with you and you had no idea what time it was when you awoke in the field)

     yes, after about 20 minutes. or maybe instantly, depending on how many people are in the field, if the field happens to be located in a reasonably populated area

10.17.19  4:14 pm   how do you answer so many questions so fast, while also working on other things?

     i do all the questions at once for a day (or sometimes 2, oops) then work as hard as i can for a day (or sometimes 2, oops). i must say, i have installed some wild keyboard shortucts a few months ago that definitely increase the speed of the entire process significantly

10.17.19  4:03 pm   favorite youtube channels (aside from yours)?

     will smith
